Package dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.dropmodification

Class BaseDropModification

java.lang.Object
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.BaseEvent
dev.strwbry.eventhorizon.events.dropmodification.BaseDropModification
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.event.Listener
Direct Known Subclasses:
BlockDropShuffle, DoubleOrNothing, MobDropShuffle
public abstract class BaseDropModification extends BaseEvent implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
Base class for handling custom drop modifications in the game. This class provides functionality to modify drops from blocks and entities, handling events such as block breaking and entity death. Extends BaseEvent and implements Listener for event handling.

  • Constructor Details

    • BaseDropModification

      public BaseDropModification(EventClassification classification, String eventName)
      Constructs a BaseDropModification with the specified classification and event name. Initializes the namespaced key for this modification.
      Parameters:
      classification - the event classification (POSITIVE/NEGATIVE)
      eventName - the unique name for this event

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public void execute()
      Executes the drop modification event by setting up modifications and registering event listeners. Logs success or failure of the execution.
      Specified by:
      execute in class BaseEvent

    • terminate

      public void terminate()
      Terminates the drop modification event by unregistering listeners and clearing modifications. Only executes if the event is currently active.
      Specified by:
      terminate in class BaseEvent

    • onBlockBreak

      public void onBlockBreak(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockBreakEvent event)
      Handles block breaking events by ensuring drops are enabled for non-creative players.
      Parameters:
      event - the block break event

    • onBlockDropItem

      Parameters:

    • setupDropModifications

      protected abstract void setupDropModifications()

    • handleBlockDrops

      protected boolean handleBlockDrops(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockDropItemEvent event)
      Processes and applies custom drops for broken blocks.
      Parameters:
      event - the block drop item event
      Returns:
      true if custom drops were applied, false otherwise

      Returns:
      true if custom drops were applied, false otherwise

      possibleDrops - list of possible items to drop
